RE Enron Master Netting Agreements Cc Thx Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email Cook Mary Mary N To RONcom Heard Marie Office Marie NRONcom cc Subject RE Enron Master AM Netting Agreements I do not have them yet Marie will you have these entities as noted in the PGE master netting agreement researched by Mary H Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Thursday November AM To Cook Mary Subject Re Enron Master Netting Agreements Have you been able to determine the location of the chief executive office of the PGE entities for purposes of UCC searches Also with reference to the list that Marie Heard furnished I take it that we should file and search against each entity If so we will of course need the exact legal name jurisdiction of organization and location of chief executive office of each Thank you Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be York NY Tel Fax Email Korkmas Deb To DebKorkmas cc Heard Marie ENRONcom Marie NRONcom Office Subject UCC Lien Searches PM Marie Heard has requested that I forward the following company names and jurisdictions for compiling UCC lien searches Dynegy Inc Incorporated in Illinois principal office in Houston TX Dynegy Marketing and Trade a Colorado general partnership principal office in Houston RE UCC Lien SearchesWe will prepare the filings today Thanks Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email Marie nroncom To Office cc Subject RE UCC Lien AM Searches Hi Lech My understanding is that you all will be handling the filings Its been so long since Ive done UCC filings that Im not sure I would even remember what to do Thanks Marie Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Friday November PM To Korkmas Deb Cc Heard Marie Subject Re UCC Lien Searches We have ordered the searches but not prepared filings Are you handling the latter or would you like us to do that too Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email Korkmas Deb To DebKorkmas cc Heard Marie ENRONcom Marie NRONcom Office Subject UCC Lien Searches RE AEP Master Netting Agr Cc I did receive the document Should I contact anyone or am I awaiting a call to discussnegotiate Thanks Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email David nroncom To Office cc Subject RE AEP Master Netting Agr PM Lech Please let me know if you did not receive the attachment via my subsequent email I understand the UCC searches and filings to be needed in relation to the attachments Section b Upon completion of negotiations I will send you an electronic copy of the finalized Netting and Setoff Agreement to faciliate Cadwaladers preparation of the financing statement filings David Portz Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Portz David Subject Re AEP Master Netting Agr I did not find an attachment Also I assume that we will prepare UCC filings and order UCC searches Thank you Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email Portz David To DavidPortz cc Sager Elizabeth ENRONcom Elizabeth NRONcom Office Heard Marie Marie NRONcom Cook Mary Mary NRONcom PM Williams Jason R Credit JasonR NRONcom Subject AEP Master Netting Agr Lech A high priority Master Netting and Setoff Agreement see attached is in the late stages of negotiation with the belowreferenced AEP affiliates The agreement is currently intended to be limited to masters transactions between ENA or EPMI and two major AEP trading affiliates American Electric Power Service Corporation as Agent for the AEP Operating Companies AEP and AEP Energy Services Inc AEPESI The Netting Agreement explicitly identifies enabling agreements between those entities relating to trading physical gas physical power and financial swaps Earlier today the Enron Credit group indicated that ENA trades using GTCs physical coal and physical synfuel with American Electric Power Service Corporation Please contact me with any questions David David A Portz Senior Counsel Enron North America Corp Smith EB a Houston Texas Phone Fax Assistant Linda Simmons Ext This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the UCC filings and searches Cc We are organizing the data regarding debtor names jurisdictions of incorporation etc for the various Master Netting Agreements that we have received over the past few days I note that some but not all jurisdictions require inclusion of the debtors organizational identification number on the UCC filing We should be able to obtain this number where necessary in most cases through an online search If not we can either ask you to track it down or give us a contact person in this regard or for a cost of per debtor obtain the information from a search firm In any event we will be back to you in a day or two with an update and perhaps requests for additional information Once we have all requisite information the filings can be made in another day or two In the meantime please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions Thank you Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate the information Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus or other defect that might affect any computer system into which it is received and opened it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use

Re FW Master Netting Agreements Cc As a threshold matter I note that the basic purpose of the UCC filings is to belt and suspender the crossparty netting provisions of the MNA by having the counterpartyies grant to each Enron party a security interest in the counterpartys receivables from Enron This is typically accomplished through the grant of a security interest in Obligations under the MNA In this case however I do not find in the Collateral provisions Section the Obligations included Is this collateral covered in a related Collateral Annex Alternatively is the omission an oversight or a deliberate choice by the parties If we do intend to have a security interest in the counterpartys receivables and it is not picked up in the CA the MNA should be revised accordingly Also if we are going to file against the receivables we will need to know in which jurisdiction FPL is organized and further if it is organized in Colorado Delaware Maryland or Texas its organizational ID number Finally we would also need to confirm for UCC filing purposes that the counterparty is not a transmitting utility ie an entity primarily engaged in the production or transmission of electricity or the transmission of goods by pipeline It would not appear to be such a utility based on its name Thank you Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email Van Hooser Steve To SteveVanHooser ENRONcom cc Heard Marie Office Marie NRONcom Subject FW Master Netting Agreements PM Please do UUC Search on the FPL Energy Power Marketing Inc
